about_the_game:
Join ScarQuest now for a chance to earn extremely rare and valuable planetary land. In ScarQuest, you can construct a home base, select favorable terrains, cleverly arrange traps and towers, and punish those who dare your wrath. Train troops, conquer enemies, dominate the arena, and forge a fearsome reputation that echoes across the cosmos!

-Manage and beautify your home base.
Construct your base from numerous selections of buildings and upgrades to increase productivity and strengthen the number of your attacking troops.
Hundreds of decorations are available to fashion your home base to your unique personal aesthetics.

-Strengthen our defenses and annihilate incoming enemies.
Combat tiles can be freely selected and arranged to build advantageous terrains. Customize the setup with a combination of traps, towers, and heroes to create an impenetrable fortress capable of adapting to any situation.

-Online sieges and real-time reinforcements.
If you happen to be online during a siege, you can enter a siege battle to disrupt your opponent using various support skills.

You can even taunt your opponents with emojis to get a good laugh!

-Train attacking troops and plunder resources.

Powerful class-based heroes excelling in manipulating the battlefields are at your command!
Equipped with decisive abilities like drawing enemy fire, team teleportation, sneak behind enemy lines, and much more, these heroes will give your army the edge to destroy enemy cores and pillage their resources.

- Defeat the aliens and earn rich rewards.

Defeating alien invasion fleets grants valuable rewards. The deadly aliens, however, are not easily trifled with. Be sure to strengthen your forces before challenging the mysterious aliens from beyond!

Come join ScarQuest and begin your universal conquest!

This game requires an internet connection to play.
